channel.title: GSoC '24 WPR on
channel.description: Recent content in GSoC '24 WPR on

item.title: Week 13 Progress Report
item.description: Tasks Completed: # During the thirteenth week of my Google Summer of Code (GSoC) project, I continued working on refactoring developing the UI elements and the Keypad features for the AGL-Demo-Control-Panel.

item.title: Week 12 Progress Report
item.description: Tasks Completed: # During the twelfth week of my Google Summer of Code (GSoC) project, I continued working on refactoring developing the UI elements and the Keypad features for the AGL-Demo-Control-Panel.

item.title: Week 10 Progress Report
item.description: Tasks Completed: # During the ninth week of my Google Summer of Code (GSoC) project, I made significant strides in implementing the CARLA-CAN-File playback feature within the Automotive Grade Linux (AGL) ecosystem.

item.title: Week 05 Progress Report
item.description: Tasks Completed: # # Code Merged this week: # 29992: Update Dockerfile for PyQt6 Compatibility.

item.title: Week 04 Progress Report
item.description: Tasks Completed: # # New Animations # This week I made significant changes to the UI elements and animations of the AGL Demo Control Panel to make it more responsive optimized.

item.title: Week 03 Progress Report
item.description: Tasks Completed: # # Updated Docker File # This week I Updated the Dockerfile to support the PyQt6 version of the AGL Demo Control Panel.

item.title: Week 02 Progress Report
item.description: Tasks Completed: # # Changes Pushed to Gerrit this Week # This week I made a few revisions to last week’s commit 29969: Port AGL Demo Control Panel to Qt6 based on code review in two patches:
